video.title: Free Flash XML Video Player
video.description: Flash Video Player is provided by flashmo.com for free of charge. You may download and use the source file for your websites. You may put a credit link back to flashmo.com if you wish to.

video.title: Integer pellentesque dignissim diam
video.description: This text is dynamically loaded from the external XML file. Also, this HTML text is formatted by the external CSS file. Maecenas nisl ante, mollis et, tincidunt vitae, feugiat sit amet, mi. Vestibulum urna. Vivamus eu tortor.
